title: Have Your Cake and Kill Him Too
description: Heiress-go-lightly Nora Blackbird and her two sisters- desperate housewife and nudist-yoga enthusiast Libby and fiercely independent Emma-are back in this rollicking mystery about a sports bar with hot wings and hotter waitresses, explosive political secrets, former rock stars, a dangerous fame-and-fortune-hungry aristo-brat, and, of course, a case of blue-blooded murder that only Nora can solve.
author: Nancy Martin
